com.cubeia.firebase.util
Interface TreeCacheInfoMBean

public interface TreeCacheInfoMBean

This is a generalized MBean to describe a JBoss tree cache. It contains simple debugging information and methods to retrieve the cache contents as a string.

Author:
Larsan

Method Summary
 String getLocalAddress()
          Get the local socket address of the cache.
 String[] getMembers()
          This method returns all members in a cache cluster, represented by their local addresses.
 int getObjectCount()
          Get the number of nodes in the cache.
 String printCacheContentDetails()
          This method attempts to print the entire cache content as a string.
 String printCacheLockingInfo()
          Print debugging information about the cache locks.
 String printJGroupsConfig()
          The cache is backed up by a jgroups channel for replication.
 

Method Detail

getLocalAddress

String getLocalAddress()
Get the local socket address of the cache. This is the end point to which the cache binds.

Returns:
The local socket end point, or null if not connected

printCacheContentDetails

String printCacheContentDetails()
This method attempts to print the entire cache content as a string. NB: Use with care as this method is very resource demanding on large caches.

Returns:
The cache content as a string, never null

printJGroupsConfig

String printJGroupsConfig()
The cache is backed up by a jgroups channel for replication. This method returns the jgroups configuration as a string.

Returns:
The jgroups configuration, or null if not started

getMembers

String[] getMembers()
This method returns all members in a cache cluster, represented by their local addresses.

Returns:
The cache cluster members, never null

getObjectCount

int getObjectCount()
Get the number of nodes in the cache.

Returns:
The number of nodes in the cache

printCacheLockingInfo

String printCacheLockingInfo()
Print debugging information about the cache locks. This method may be resource heavy, so use with care.

Returns:
Cache lock information as a string, or null if not connected
